md:
giải nghĩa từ "uniforms" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Uniforms /juːnɪˈfɔːrmz/ (noun)

* Meaning: clothes worn by people in a particular organization or profession, especially as a way of identifying them.

Example sentence: The police officers wore their uniforms to the ceremony.

* Meaning: a set of clothes worn by students in a school.

Example sentence: The school has introduced new uniforms for all students.

* Meaning: a standard or consistent design or style.

Example sentence: The company has a uniform design for all its products.

Related words:

* Uniform (adjective): consistent or identical in quality, texture, or character.
Example sentence: The uniform quality of the products has helped the company to gain a good reputation.
* Uniformly (adverb): in a consistent or uniform manner.
Example sentence: The company has uniformly applied the new policy to all its employees.

Note: The word "uniforms" can also refer to the clothes worn by athletes or players in a particular sport or team.
